name: CENTCOM HQ
desc: The Draconis Alliance CENTCOM is the uncompromising answer to the question of Fafnir’s security. Conceived in the earliest days of the alliance, this massive subterranean complex serves as the strategic brain and backbone of the system’s spaceborne defences, and is home to the Alliance Intelligence Office. Rumours persist that there is some hidden Domain-era technology buried deep within the core. The 'Office' assures that this is entirely false.
